title: Big Gmail redesign starts rolling out to personal accounts as Google explains how the new UI works
content:
At the end of last month, Google officially detailed the “new integrated view” for Gmail on the web. This redesign is now rolling out for the first Gmail users, including those with personal Google Accounts.

more…

The post Big Gmail redesign starts rolling out to personal accounts as Google explains how the new UI works appeared first on 9to5Google.
